summary:
I wanted to make a home for the all around adventurer that didnt look like your average home (I believe I\'ve succeeded so far) 
It also had to have everything you\'d need for crafting.
 
(A WIP & I\'ll add/fix anything within a day or two of a comment being left for me. =)
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to make a home for the all around adventurer that didnt look like your average home (I believe I\'ve succeeded so far) 

*(A WIP & I\'ll add/fix anything within a day or two of a comment being left for me. =)
 
It is mostly empty (no food or plates or other crap all around) so you can fill it with all the treasures and collectibles from your travels. So it does have quite a few chests, display cases and shelves all around.
 
It has the more important crafting tools (Forge, Grindstone, workbench, Enchanter etc...)
 
It also has a small under-garden with alot of different types of harvestable plants.

1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 

Total upgrade to the bedroom  ^__^

New plaque above the custom forge. 
New Floors and a New Door 
I\'ve also added some shelves & Statuettes of the bigger statues.

Also All the chairs and display cases work now too. (the damn weapon rack doesnt tho...YET)

1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3 1.3

This is my first mod and it is a Work-In-Progress, so ANY tips or criticism is always welcome. 
Thanks Again for the the download and If you get a free 8seconds (and you liked the house) Please Endorse =D


__________________________________________
INSTALL
--------------------------------------------------------------
Use 7 Zip (or any other unpacking program) 
Move the file into your skyrim/data folder
On the skyrim launcher select \"1crazy house\"
Enjoy
Endorse? ;)
_________________________________________________________________________________________
author: HeroTheory
